notes.text: Security update for HA kernel modules
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
This update provides rebuilds of HA kernel modules with retpoline
support to mitigate Spectre Variant 2 (CVE-2017-5715 bsc#1068032)

cluster fs also received these bugfixes:

- backport patch to fix dlmglue false deadlock (bnc#962257)
- Fix for online increase of filesystem in kernel mode fails (bsc#936517).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
